name: Evolution (itch) (DoctorMeow18)
description: The controls since we were restricted are move the mouse where you want your player to go.  Space bar makes you change forms between the human, monkey, and ape.  Shift is the interaction button and this varies between the characters.  When you press shift when on the human he shoots his bow and arrow doing slash damage.  When on the ape character when you press shift the ape punches doing blunt damage.
